author: makortel
body:
Resolves #22266. Add internal counter to the `MixItr` counting the number of iterated elements, and use that for `operator!=()`. The `MixCollection<T>::end()` is implemented by calculating the number of all signal and pileup objects from all the contained `CrossingFrame<T>`s.

Tested in CMSSW_10_1_X_2018-02-18-2300. Expecting changes at some level (probably not much, given that this "randomness" has been there since 2005).
title: Fix undefined behaviour in MixCollection<T>::MixItr
